cars.title: 2022 Chevrolet Corvette
cars.description: The 2022 Chevrolet Corvette claims the top spot in the luxury sports car class, thanks to its value proposition, lightning-quick acceleration, precise handling, comfortable and well-trimmed interior, and intuitive tech features.

cars.title: 2023 Audi R8
cars.description: The 2023 Audi R8 rides off into the sunset on a high note – more specifically, the blare of its V10 engine. It's brutally fast, thrilling to drive and dressed to the nines with quality materials, though it's not exactly practical, fuel-efficient or even remotely affordable.

cars.title: 2022 Porsche Cayman
cars.description: The 2022 Porsche Cayman is everything you want a luxury sports car to be: fast, agile, and posh. However, some rivals offer more standard features.

cars.title: 2022 Mercedes-Benz GT
cars.description: The 2022 Mercedes-AMG GT has a top-notch interior, lots of high-tech features and amenities, and zesty driving dynamics, but it can't match the outright firepower or razor-sharp handling of the top models in the luxury sports car class.

cars.title: 2022 Porsche Boxster
cars.description: The 2022 Porsche Boxster climbs toward the top of the luxury sports car class partly on the strength of its well-rounded performance and high predicted reliability score.

cars.title: 2022 Lexus LC
cars.description: The 2022 Lexus LC ranks midpack among luxury sports cars. It delivers spry acceleration, well-rounded handling attributes, and a classy cabin, but it comes up short in rear-seat and cargo space, and its infotainment controls are cumbersome.

cars.title: 2022 Audi TT
cars.description: The 2022 Audi TT finishes in the bottom half of our luxury sports car rankings. It’s fun to drive and has a great interior, but it can’t quite match the blinding performance of some class rivals

cars.title: 2021 Lexus LC
cars.description: The 2021 Lexus LC finishes in the top half of our luxury sports car rankings. It's fun to drive, with a first-rate interior and a comfortable ride, even if it doesn't have the blinding athleticism of some classmates.

cars.title: 2023 BMW 8-Series
cars.description: The 2023 BMW 8 Series combines thrilling performance with a luxurious cabin, representing the best of what the brand has to offer.

cars.title: 2022 Porsche 911
cars.description: The 2022 Porsche 911 ranks highly among luxury sports cars thanks in part to its enticing acceleration, standard-setting handling, and impeccable quality.
